content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, nice to meet you. I am offering a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It is close to all important facilities. Now, I am looking for a fair price for this apartment. How much do you have in mind? Remember, I am open to all offers, but of course, I am also hoping for a higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That sounds good. I would like to rent the apartment for 500 euros per month, including all costs.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I appreciate your offer, Max. However, I must admit that I was expecting a higher price. This apartment is in the city center, close to all important facilities. I am willing to negotiate, but I believe the price should be higher. What is your highest offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understanding your point, I am willing to increase my offer slightly. I propose 550 euros per month, including all costs.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for increasing your offer, Max. However, I still believe the price should be higher. This apartment is in the city center, close to all important facilities. I am willing to negotiate further, but I believe the price should be higher. What is your highest offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position. As a student, I have to consider my budget. My highest offer is 600 euros per month, including all costs.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I appreciate your understanding, Max. However, as a landlord, I have to consider the value of the property. This apartment is in the city center, close to all important facilities. I am willing to negotiate further, but I believe the price should be higher. What is your highest offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
[Question]
I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I have already provided my highest offer.
name: Max Müller from Germany
